modName: Norine the escaped Thalmor prisoner-A Standalone Companion
summary: Hired by Siddgeir, the Jarl of Falkreath, killer of Agent Sanyon, captured and escorted to Northwatch Keep.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Special Information[/b]

[color=yellow]If you are looking for a fantasy female mod, this isn't what you want so please move on without commenting. This mod depicts a woman that has literally been through Hell and survived. There are plenty of pretty girl followers to choose from, well posed and smiling. This mod doesn't give you that. Norine is a more realistic character so she will not appeal to everyone.[/color]

Description

Hired by Siddgeir, the Jarl of Falkreath, to patrol the foothills of Lake Llinalta, Ranger Norine Gludersdottir interrupted a massacre by the Thalmor at a Statue and shrine of Talos. Enraged at the sight she loosed an arrow into the Justiciar giving orders, killing him instantly. The rest of the Thalmor fell upon her, but as the blade plunged toward her, the Sub-Justiciar stayed them. Fearing Elenwen’s wrath, the Sub-Justiciar felt returning with at least one nord prisoner, might mitigate some of her anger. Especially since that fool, Agent Sanyon, was dead.

Captured, bound and beaten, Norine Gludersdottir and her captors started for Northwatch Keep. A day into the journey, she managed to slip her bonds and grab a dagger from the belt of the Justiciar. Holding the dagger to the Justiciar’s throat Norine ordered the Thalmor soldiers to drop their weapons. She then smashed the hilt of the dagger into the Justiciar's head, stunning her, and fled into the forest.

Crossing the Hjaal River, she struggled through the wetlands of Hjaalmarch and the numerous bandit camps where, if they found her, killing her would be the least they would do. Then, fearing arrest in Morthal, she skirted to the south of the city laboring to reach The Pale. Starving, near death from exposure, she managed to steal a boat from a fisherman on the shore of Lake Yorgrim and, using the last of her strength, enter the current of the Yorgrim River before collapsing. Finally, when all seemed lost, a sailor on the Windhelm docks spotted her floating past. Pulling her to safety, the sailor called for the guard who took Norine to Candlehearth Hall where Elda Early-Dawn nursed her back to health.


Where to find her:

She resides in the Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.

Installation

[color=yellow][b]NMM strongly recommended.[/b][/color]
There are two versions regular and Nevernude, please choose just one.

This mod contains a number of loose files that need to be added to the meshes and texture folders. Missing one during manual installation will cause face and body problems.

Manual Installation

Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to the Skyrim data
folder exactly as the archive shows. Be sure to enable the Norine Gludersdottir.esp

How to Uninstall

If installed with NMM use NMM and simply uninstall.

If manually installed delete:
meshesNorine Gludersdottir and
meshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomNorine Gludersdottir.esp
texturesKarita Ivansdotter and
texturescharacterfacegendatafacetintNorine Gludersdottir
Then delete the Norine Gludersdottir.esp in the data folder.

Incompatibility

None, if using a valid copy of Skyrim and updated to the latest version.

[color=red][b]Known Issues[/b][/color]

If you are limited in vram and running a lot of 2K texture mods, this mod may cause black face in some circumstances. Norine Gludersdottir uses a lot of HQ textures.

Used in screenshots:

(Hunter Armor)[/url]

Images

Feel free to post your images but remember no nudity or coarse language. Keep it clean and immersive.
